text:
e="preserve">Carme Contreras i Verdiales (4 October 1932 – 6 July 2020) was a Spanish actress. She was known for dubbing the voice E.T. in "E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial", mother Fratelli in "The Goonies" and Marge Simpson in "The Simpsons" in their Catalan versions. On television, her best known role was in "El Cor de la Ciutat".
Contreras i Verdiales died on 6 July 2020, aged 87.
